item.title: How to make a Model Maker (.Bat File)

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. This is just a snippet, not showing us how to ‘make’ anything.
  2. If you want to release an actual tool, give more information about how to use it and examples before posting.

item.title: How to make a Model Maker (.Bat File)
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

[size=24pt]Okay, so today I’m going to show you how to make a model maker.[/size]

[size=14pt]First of all open notepad. Type:

[code]@ECHO OFF
TITLE Model Maker
color 0B
:maker
cls

ECHO.
ECHO Welcome to Model Maker!
ECHO 1.) What Model Type are you making?
ECHO Types: mask, phat, helm, plate body, plate legs
ECHO.
SET /P ModelType=Model Type?

if %ModelType%==mask GOTO mask
if %ModelType%==phat GOTO phat
if %ModelType%==helm GOTO helm
if %ModelType%==plate body GOTO body
if %ModelType%==plate legs GOTO legs

:mask
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID:
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option:
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color:
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name:
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description:
ECHO.

ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = “%option%”;
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 900;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 400;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 1850;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 3188;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 255;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 255;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 100;
ECHO class8.aString170 = “%Name%”;
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = “%describe%”.getBytes();
ECHO }

SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye

:phat
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID:
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option:
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color:
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name:
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description:
ECHO.

ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = “%option%”;
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2635;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 440;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 76;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 1850;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 187;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 363;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 29;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 87;
ECHO class8.aString170 = “%Name%”;
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = “%describe%”.getBytes();
ECHO }

SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye

:helm
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID:
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option:
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color:
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name:
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description:
ECHO.

ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = “%option%”;
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2813;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 800;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 160;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 152;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 3;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = -5;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 218;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 395;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 57;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 117;
ECHO class8.aString170 = “%Name%”;
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = “%describe%”.getBytes();
ECHO }

SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye

:body
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID:
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option:
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color:
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name:
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description:
ECHO.

ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = “%option%”;
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2378;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 1180;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 452;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = -1;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = -1;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 3379;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 3383;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = -1;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = -1;
ECHO class8.aString170 = “%Name%”;
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = “%describe%”.getBytes();
ECHO }

SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye

:legs
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID:
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option:
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color:
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name:
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description:
ECHO.

ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = “%option%”;
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 5026;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 800;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 160;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 152;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 3;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = -5;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 5024;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 5024;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 5024;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 5024;
ECHO class8.aString170 = “%Name%”;
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = “%describe%”.getBytes();
ECHO }

SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye

:bye
cls
ECHO.
ECHO _______________________________________________
ECHO | Thanks for using Model Maker!!! |
ECHO -----------------------------------------------
ECHO.
[/code]

[size=14pt]Now VERY IMPORTANT, Save it as “Model Maker.bat”[/size]

[size=14pt].bat will make it a windows batch file.[/size]

[size=10pt]I really hope this helped you guys! :)[/size]
